summary: This is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General, used to document an employee's agreement to provide information voluntarily as part of an investigation. The form includes warnings, assurances, and a signature section.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General.
The investigation is being conducted under the Inspector General Act of 1978.
The employee is informed that no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer questions.
Any statement provided may be used in future criminal or agency disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes a waiver section where the employee confirms understanding and willingness to participate voluntarily.
